Recap: Speaking at Blackbaud’s BBCon 2018 in Orlando

If you read my post about heading to BBCon to speak, you know that this was a goal of mine since 2017 when I went to my first BBCon. It became a reality and in a session called “Strategies from the Best Blackbaud TeamRaiser that Never Launched.” Alongside Kari, and Mark from Cathexis Partners.

My Segment From The Session

Not sure if you guys could tell, but I was pretty nervous. All the notes I had written down when out the window and I decided to talk a bit more around the slides. I wanted to focus on digestible content and the great use I made from WordPress.

The Rest of BBCon

During the two days I was in Orlando for BBCon, I was able to catch a few great sessions and learned quite a few things that I could add to my personal knowledge base. But what good is a recap without pitcutes right?
